name: BINKY XXIII: The Slump-Ken
description:
If you have the time, please read "onMasterSlaveAndGodotDevelopers" in txt or pdf formats

The twentry-third in the award winning BINKY series!

WHAT HAS SCIENCE DONE?

The mysterious scientist ILYA IVANOV injected BINKY with a mysterious serum, and now... every full moon... it happens!

Controls:

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

Esc - Quit

Credits:

Various Artworks from Klik&Play

Cynocephalus from Nuremberg Chronical (Schedelsche Weltchronik)

Ilya Ivanov by unknown photographer

Les Lupins by Maurice Sand

Brick Texture by Microsoft

Music:

WCW Buff Daddy
